de.zabuza.soundEngine

Class SoundEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.soundEngine.SoundEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FakeSoundEngine, WorkingSoundEngine

    public abstract class SoundEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    SoundEngine. Provides playing .wav mono sounds and .midi or .mid. Will create a own stereo interpretation of sounds with the x- and y-coords of the SoundSource.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Method Detail

      • clientTick

        public abstract void clientTick()
        Updates the sounds and plays the next bytes. Should be triggered by a tick-system, like 24 ticks per seconds.

      • getMusicVolume

        public final float getMusicVolume()
        Gets the current music volume.
        Returns:
        Current music volume from 0.0 to 1.0

      • getSoundVolume

        Gets the current sound volume.
        Returns:
        Current sound volume from 0.0 to 1.0

      • loadSample

        public abstract SoundSample loadSample(java.lang.String resourceName)
        Loads and returns a sample from an url.
        Parameters:
        resourceName - URL of the sample
        Returns:
        Loaded SoundSample from the url

      • loadSequence

        public final javax.sound.midi.Sequence loadSequence(java.io.InputStream sequenceStream)
        Loads and returns a Midi Sequence from an InputStream. Will patch the loaded Sequence so it will not make problems.
        Parameters:
        sequenceStream - Sequences InputStream to load from
        Returns:
        Loaded and patched sequence

      • play

        public abstract void play(SoundSample sample,
        SoundSource soundSource,
        float priority,
        float thatRate)
        Plays a SoundSample from a SoundSource with a rate and priority.
        Parameters:
        sample - SoundSample to play
        soundSource - SoundSource of the sample
        priority - Priority of the sample
        thatRate - Rate of the sample
